supplyDemandQuery.title: feed consumption by meat and dairy tech
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='Beef' or @name='SheepGoat' or @name='Pork' or @name='Dairy' or @name='Poultry' )]/ *[@type='subsector']/*[@type='technology']/ *[@type='input' and not(@name='renewable') and not(contains(@name,'water_td'))]/ demand-physical/node()

emissionsQueryBuilder.title: CO2 emissions by tech (excluding resource production)

aQuery.supplyDemandQuery: sector demand-physical[@vintage] *[@type='sector' and not (@name='Exports_N fertilizer')]// *[@type='input' and (@name='N fertilizer')]/demand-physical/node()Diff
